Package com.tailf.ncs.alarmman.producer

The Alarm Manager produces package provides support for injection of alarms into the NCS Alarm list.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlarmSinkCentralMBean
    This is the JMX interface for the AlarmSinkCentral class
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlarmSink
    The class AlarmSink represents a "sink" where Alarm object is added to be written to the alarm table.
    AlarmSinkCentral
    An AlarmSinkCentral represent a central "proxy" for created AlarmSink's.

Package com.tailf.ncs.alarmman.producer Description

The Alarm Manager produces package provides support for injection of alarms into the NCS Alarm list. Example 1: Injection of alarm directly 


 // If the NCS JVM has not been started with the same JVM,

     //
     // You will need a CDB socket to write you alarms.
     //
            socket = new Socket("127.0.0.1",Conf.NCS_PORT);
            cdb = new Cdb("my-cdb", socket);

            AlarmSink sink = new AlarmSink(cdb);

            ArrayList<AlarmId> idList = new ArrayList<AlarmId>();

            idList.add(new AlarmId(new ManagedDevice("device0"),
                    new ConfIdentityRef(new NcsAlarms().hash(),
                     NcsAlarms._ncs_dev_manager_alarm),
              new ManagedObject("/ncs:devices/device[name=device0]" +
              "/config/root1")));

            idList.add(new AlarmId(new ManagedDevice("device0"),
             new ConfIdentityRef(new NcsAlarms().hash(),
             NcsAlarms._ncs_dev_manager_alarm),
            new ManagedObject("/ncs:devices/device[name=device0]" +
              "/config/root2")));



            sink.submitAlarm(new ManagedDevice("device0"),
             new ManagedObject("/ncs:devices/device[name=device0]" +
               "/config/root3"),
                new ConfIdentityRef(new NcsAlarms().hash(),
                   NcsAlarms._ncs_dev_manager_alarm),
                    PerceivedSeverity.WARNING,
                    new ConfBuf("This is a warning"),
                    null,
                    idList,
                    null,
                    ConfDatetime.getConfDatetime(),
                    new AlarmAttribute(new myAlarm(),
                            myAlarm._custom_alarm_attribute_,
                            AttributeType.ALARM,
                           new ConfBuf("this is an alarm attribute")),
                    new AlarmAttribute(new myAlarm(),
                         myAlarm._custom_status_change_attribute_,
                              AttributeType.STATUS_CHANGE,
              new ConfBuf("this is a status change attribute")));
Example 2: Injection of alarm through AlarmSinkCental which is started when NCS JVM is started 



            AlarmSink sink = new AlarmSink();

      ArrayList<AlarmId> idList = new ArrayList<AlarmId>();

            idList.add(new AlarmId(new ManagedDevice("device0"),
                    new ConfIdentityRef(new NcsAlarms().hash(),
                     NcsAlarms._ncs_dev_manager_alarm),
              new ManagedObject("/ncs:devices/device[name=device0]" +
              "/config/root1")));

            idList.add(new AlarmId(new ManagedDevice("device0"),
             new ConfIdentityRef(new NcsAlarms().hash(),
             NcsAlarms._ncs_dev_manager_alarm),
            new ManagedObject("/ncs:devices/device[name=device0]" +
              "/config/root2")));



            sink.submitAlarm(new ManagedDevice("device0"),
             new ManagedObject("/ncs:devices/device[name=device0]" +
               "/config/root3"),
                new ConfIdentityRef(new NcsAlarms().hash(),
                   NcsAlarms._ncs_dev_manager_alarm),
                    PerceivedSeverity.WARNING,
                    new ConfBuf("This is a warning"),
                    null,
                    idList,
                    null,
                    ConfDatetime.getConfDatetime(),
                    new AlarmAttribute(new myAlarm(),
                            myAlarm._custom_alarm_attribute_,
                            AttributeType.ALARM,
                           new ConfBuf("this is an alarm attribute")),
                    new AlarmAttribute(new myAlarm(),
                         myAlarm._custom_status_change_attribute_,
                              AttributeType.STATUS_CHANGE,
              new ConfBuf("this is a status change attribute")));
